description: You'll find yourself reaching for the Men's Olden Polartec®1/2-Zip Jacket from chilly late-summer nights all the way through spring ski season. Wear it as stretchy, moisture-wicking outerwear while training for your cold-weather marathon or grab your shell and board and use it as a soft, breathable midlayer for days carving up that fresh powder. Earned yourself an off-day after an epic climbing session at the crag? The Olden Jacket also shines as comfy loungewear when staying in and chilling hard are on the agenda.
name: Marmot Olden Polartec 1/2 Zip - Mens

specs.value: Polartec® Power Stretch® 84% Recycled Polyester, 16% Elastane Jersey
